name: Qush
description: Qush is a 70/30 indica-dominant cannabis strain from TGA Genetics, who combines Pre-98 Bubba Kush with Space Queen. Bred for potency as well as flavor, Qushâ€™s resin-packed buds radiate with sweet aromas of grape, cherry, and hashy spice. This tranquilizing strain has a way of calming worries and upset stomachs, but keep in mind that Qush can have a sedating, cloudy effect on the mind so consider saving this one for evenings and lazy days.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Uplifted, Happy, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
